Package peregrine.controller

Main interface for the controller which allows one to kick off and execute jobs in the cluster.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ClusterState Keeps track of the state of the whole cluster.
Controller Main interface for running a map reduce job in Peregrine.
ControllerDaemon Basic daemon for running the controller only (no FS operations).
ControllerHandler Netty support for handling controller message.
ControllerPipelineFactory Netty pipeline handler for our controller.
Gossip Keeps track of system failures in the controller.
JobOperation The basic / low-level Peregrine operation.
JobState The current state of a Job in Peregrine.
Main Command line main() class for the controller daemon and running batch jobs.
MarkOfflineTimer Timer for marking a host offline if we do not receive heartbeat messages in a timely manner.
Offline Keeps track off hosts that were explicitly marked offline.
Online Keeps track of hosts once they come online.
 

Package peregrine.controller Description

Main interface for the controller which allows one to kick off and execute jobs in the cluster.
